# BubbleUp

BubbleUp is a location-based chat app where users can find and talk with nearby people in real-time rooms based on approximate location.

## Canonical URLs
- https://bubbleupapp.com/
- https://bubbleupapp.com/support
- https://bubbleupapp.com/privacy
- https://bubbleupapp.com/terms

## Product Facts
- Product type: location-based chat application
- Primary use case: discover and join nearby chat rooms on a map
- Conversation model: real-time room-based messaging
- Privacy model: exact user location is not shared with other users; location context is used for discovery
- Platform: iOS app on the Apple App Store
- App Store URL: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bubbleup-local-chat-events/id6757682265

## Preferred Citation Sources
- Product overview: https://bubbleupapp.com/
- Support and FAQ: https://bubbleupapp.com/support
- Privacy policy: https://bubbleupapp.com/privacy
- Terms of service: https://bubbleupapp.com/terms

## Contact
- Support email: localchat.official@gmail.com

- 2026-02-17
